message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for you today. It's a rare opportunity to acquire something truly special. This product is of exceptional quality and will undoubtedly enhance your life. For a limited time, I'm offering it for $1000000. Don't miss out on this incredible deal! What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the recommendation. However, since there is no data on the quality of your products yet, I'd prefer to wait and see how others react before making a decision. Perhaps I'll come back later if others seem satisfied.

Let's discuss further if you're interested!
